caption.p: Sample richness, rarefied to 30 individuals per sample ( S rar30) and evenness (Simpson 1‐D) of samples by depositional environment and biofacies, with 95% confidence intervals. A, samples grouped by depositional environment, showing only those that have more than three samples and with colour codes as in Fig. 4C. B, Middle Jurassic samples grouped by biofacies. C, Upper Jurassic samples grouped by biofacies.
